name: Solar Facility Manager
description:
Controlls:
Use A and D to walk around. 

E to toggle lights and power usage of the room your currently in

use W and S  or UpArrow DownArrow   to move an elevator if you stay near it (can reach from both floors)

use LeftArrow and RightArrow to move solar panel

SPACE - PauseMenu

Goal:
Don't run out of power !
Use the solar panel  and collect suns to earn power.
NPCs will toggle   on every room they pass put NOT toggle it off
Make sure to turn unused rooms off to not use too much power!

The elevators are a little unstable so be careful to not break your ways to another floor!
